title: I don't understand how some people can be so careless in ranked.
body: I spend 40 minutes in a game slowly coming back and managing to win, then the next game, my adc and jungle feed 8 kills between them and lose the game for me. Meanwhile I'm still literally carrying them as Riven but too many of them were too fed for us to actually win.

replies.body:
That isn't a matter of carelessness. Everyone has bad games, including you. You can't say you've never fed before, everyone has. It's bad luck.

If people don't seem to take it as seriously as you, it's because *they* realise it's just a game. Because luck is involved, you're going to have bad and good games, but over the long-term average they even out to accurately describe your skill level. The 2 (out of hundreds) games you described lean more towards bad-luck games than good-luck. That's the life of a solo queuer. No amount of blaming is going to change that.

The last time I 'fed' was yesterday as Wukong when I would ping a target, get an 'On My Way' ping from Yasuo who was meant to follow up my ult who then continuously backed off as I engaged and pursued a solo target (usually the enemy support or tank mao).
cant 1 vs 5 as riven? dont deserve the win.

Exhaust, man. You can shut someone down with exhaust alone if they're the only damage source - especially if it's burst damage. I'll accept some blame, and I'll accept that some people just have bad games. But I won't accept that it's ok for people to have a bad game and not play cautiously at all. At least if I lose lane, I freeze farm then TP when my team needs me - if the enemy top laner still wants to CS, they will be an easy kill for my jungler/roaming mid, and if they blow their TP for nothing I can shove all my waves under his tower and take it.

> Exhaust, man. So much easier to shut someone down with exhaust alone if they're the only damage source. I'll accept some blame, and I'll accept that some people just have bad games. But I won't accept that it's ok for people to have a bad game and not play cautiously at all. At least if I lose lane, I freeze farm then TP when my team needs me - if the enemy top laner still wants to CS, they will be an easy kill for my jungler/roaming mid, and if they blow their TP for nothing I can shove all my waves under his tower and take it.

I feel like you're in Bronze 5, nearly the same as me.

Yeah, man. That's what the Gold Emblem next to name means...

I'm sorry if you can't comprehend what I'm saying, but that doesn't change that fact that It's true.

what gold emblem? i dont see anything cos its boards now and they havnt implemented badges yet.

either way, if riven cant 1 vs 5 purely cos of 1 exhaust....you need to time your engages better. learn the timers for exhaust and watch when its used.
if they run double or triple exhaust, which people are doing more often now, with heal/barrier being poorer choices for long range mids vs burst assassins and ignite just being plain %%%%%%ed in those match ups, mid lane exhausts are becoming more common. sorry if that happens to you errygame now.
but exhaust shouldnt 1 shot kill a riven. because she has ALOT more than just 1 burst combo. and GA gives her a hell of a chance to come back after an exhaust blows her up. just dont use everything while exhausted, use what you need to survive as long as possible till exhaust ends.
its the same reason a really fed yi doesnt care much about exhaust unless its chained correctly with a ton of CC. but then, its the yi's fault if he entered the fight too early and just got chained to death erry tym.

I don't think you grasp the concept of what I'm saying. In the game I was in, I was winning 3v1 fights and died less than the enemy ezreal and kassadin who were 20/7 and 10/5 respectively. That still wasn't enough to polish the proverbial turd that was my team.

EDIT 1: Also, I thought I had the Gold icon on still.

EDIT 2: Please note that I'm not really b%tching about ranked in general, just that some people really don't respect the fact that them doing dumb sh%t is potentially spoiling the efforts players make in prior games. Like, if I was in this situation but also getting clamped I'd be losing my sh*t on the player(s) that fed.
